website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable fit in a hard hat that's easy to adjust. Full brim will protect you from the sun.
pros: Brim size won't impede your upward vision too much
Comfortable to wear for an entire day because of lightweight design
Ratcheting knob ensures you can create a tight and comfortable fit
Fits best on people with smaller heads
cons: Must assemble interior components on your own

customer_reviews.title: No replacement Suspensions available
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy Hard Hats ordered a couple dozen for our company. My only issue is Safety Works doesn't offer a replacement Suspension and the Product number on the ones we bought from Amazon don't match up with any Hardhats on their Webpage. If you don't replace our hardhat suspensions then these are a good hardhat. If you do want replacement suspensions go with MSA. My HH product code SWX0003f
customer_reviews.author: Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The suspension fits my head well
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The suspension fits my head well, although it took a day or two for it to "break in." Either that or my head is just used to it now. Regardless, it's comfy, relatively light and is not fatiguing. The ratchet adjustment is fine enough so you don't have to worry about turning one click and it being too tight, then one click the other way and it being too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan M. Labrador, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very very good and comfortable hard hat.
customer_reviews.text: I got one of those awesome new Halo hard hat lights and it didn’t fit my Cap-Style hard hat very well so I bought this. Well it didn’t fit this hat very well either BUT I will say that I really like this hard hat as it is way more comfortable than my old one. My new light might not fit it but that’s more of a fault with Halo not the hat. This is a really good hat and light be damned.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Haskins

customer_reviews.title: great hard hat
customer_reviews.text: If you need a hard hat that won't give you a headache by the end of the day, look no further. Most of the hard hats you will find at the home improvement stores lack the ratcheting knob adjustment and most importantly adequate brow padding across the front. You don't want to go home at the end of the day with a red indention across the top of your brow. This hat has a nice padded piece of foam that is covered with some kind of breathable nylon fabric that doesn't have a tendency to stick to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a v top hard hat from these people before. Trying to buy a again like it says on Amazon but when I got it it's a piece of crap and it's not a V top.
customer_reviews.author: Badass 66

customer_reviews.title: Basic hard hat.
customer_reviews.text: Basic hard hat, just the way you want them. Hope we will never have to actually rely on them.
customer_reviews.author: autocase

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hardhat nine months ago. This is easily the most comfortable hardhat I've ever had. I work in the shipping industry around cranes, forklifts all manner of suspended loads. Looking up or hanging over the edge of a barge, I've never felt like this hardhat would fall off my head. The full brim helps keep rain off my neck as well. I highly recommend this hardhat.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like the promo picture.
customer_reviews.text: The hard hat does not look like the picture. I order it for my friend that wanted the hard hat to have the V shave at the top instead of the stripe in the middle. The one I got was the stripe in the middle. I requested a return like a month ago and till today I have not got an answer.
customer_reviews.author: Yuritzi Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: AzTrucker
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a hard hat with a full brim but instead received the cap style hard hat. They realized the mistake they had made and told me to go ahead and donate the hardhat to a good charity and they refunded my money. We all make mistakes but it's how we handle them that matters... trust goes a long way with me. I will definitely be a return customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: truckerjoe

customer_reviews.title: good value!  nice hard hat!
customer_reviews.text: nice solid hard hat for a really reasonable price. comfortable and well put together. assembly only took me about 2 minutes, and i never once had to check the instructions. kind of hoping someone drops something on my head now. that's how much confidence this inspires. i'm glad i spent the extra 5 bucks for something a little nicer than the cheapest models!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Well built and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When you're required to wear the hard hat all day long you want that hat to be comfortable and know its going to protect your noggin. Right out of the box this hat is ready for long hours of wear and use. This hat combined with the proper jacket will keep you dry and prevent sunburn. This hat feels durable and will last you a long time. After 5 years of use the headband is still comfortable and the hat is still at 100 percent usability.
customer_reviews.author: Cbb24

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an even better price
customer_reviews.text: Product is lightweight which is nice. Full brim feature may take some time getting used to if you’ve never had one before, but I think it’s a better design than standard models. Ratcheting adjuster in back is a nice, solid, simple to use addition.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Amazon Prime or great hard hats
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this safety hat for our property manager, who much too-often hits his head when going into the crawl spaces of buildings. Hopefully, he will wear it to reduce the frequency of headaches and reduce the need for bandages.....I decided hubby also needed one. As a Prime member, we received the hard hat promptly and it is as described in the ad. Can't beat Amazon Prime or great hard hats!
customer_reviews.author: E in TN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Hard Hat!! I work in a nuclear power plant, and I have to wear my hard hat all day. This hard hat is well balanced and very light. I would purchase this hard hat again, and recommend it to my friends/coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and durable hard hat
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and durable hard hat. This hard hat stays in place very well with my work activities. My daughter calls it a" dozer" hard hat because it reminds her of the hard hats worn by Dozers in " Fraggle Rock"
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Paul

customer_reviews.title: Protect your dome!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, I use it for rock collection in areas where my head could be in danger. Nice shape, doesn't look as dorky as other brands. Get the sweat liners for this though, it makes a world of difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ryun

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Good hard hat, just one problem, the company I work for decided to go with blue ones so I had to order a blue one.
customer_reviews.author: lineman52

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Husband is always hitting his head. Thought this would be a good thing for him. Actually surprised that he uses it but he has found it to be very beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: wbocrafter

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: Great looking Hard Hat. if you are not aware, hard hats should be replaced every 4 to 5 years. This is a great looking and functional replacement
customer_reviews.author: walter F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice head gear.
customer_reviews.text: Great head gear, fits great, light and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: PeterR

customer_reviews.title: Not the style depicted
customer_reviews.text: Not the style of hard hat depicted. If you want one with the "V" going from front to back do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jinxed

customer_reviews.title: Good against nails
customer_reviews.text: This works very well in the attic. I have a lot of nails in my attic facing away from the roof and I've hit my head on them a few times. This blocks them good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: The search stops here.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great full brim hard hat. It also has a spot to add accessories that is not pictured here.
customer_reviews.author: Owen S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the full brim and the comfort of this hard hat
customer_reviews.text: its amazing how you forget your wearing this hard hat, even with a light and stickers on it you can hardly tell its there. It adjusts so nice and fits snug too for optimal comfort and safety
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid helmet
customer_reviews.text: My father needed a new helmet for his construction job. I found this on amazon and he was pleased with it. He has been in construction for most of his adult life, so if it's good for him it should be good for most.
customer_reviews.author: Miqueas

customer_reviews.title: Not whats in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Not what i ordered. Different from the picture looks really bulky and ugly. Dont buy if you're looking for a V top
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Nice hard hat
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a more classic shape hard hat and I love it. Very comfortable (even with my "big fat bucket head" as my wife would say) to wear. Use it a lot for forest/tree work.
customer_reviews.author: P. LaHaye

customer_reviews.title: Great hard hat!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, easy to adjust, and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: vb

customer_reviews.title: Headband is horrible. Sits too high on my head and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Headband is horrible. Sits too high on my head and is not comfortable... I would try to buy local next time to ensure proper fit and quality... I wasted $16.00 on this hardhat...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable to wear and light
customer_reviews.text: My first hard hat.Great fit, comfortable to wear and light! Quality product.. get one!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a hard hat. It fits. It meets safety requirements.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Safety First
customer_reviews.text: It has lightned the load for me here on the FOB. My neck and head thank you. I have already decorated it with my red Medical cross and a ton of Ohio state stickers to represent my state. Thanks again for a great product that has saved me from a few bumps on the head already.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Topp

customer_reviews.title: Function, Appearance,  Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: Simple design, and styling. The headband adjust knob makes it easy to add or remove layers of clothing as the weather changes. The headband causes sweat to drip into my eyes, so I have added an aftermarket cloth headband over the stock plastic/ foam.
customer_reviews.author: rail raven

customer_reviews.title: Better than 3M
customer_reviews.text: As far as the cheap hardhats MSA is the best buy. I have used 3M and while they look great and are very well priced they do not fit as well as the MSA. They tend to ride high even when adjusted and this leads to the hardhat falling off when you bend down. The only way to prevent it is to tighten the heck out of it which leads to a headache. 3M makes a lot of great products, their hard hat isn't one of them. Go with MSA.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Riley

customer_reviews.title: NOT a V-Guard...false advertising
customer_reviews.text: The description states that this hard hat is a V-Guard and it is NOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chancey Gallant

customer_reviews.title: good hat, interesting assembly
customer_reviews.text: fits well, seems sturdy, but be sure to look at the instructions properly when trying to assemble the headband. the trick: the tabs bend over backwards before you put them in the slots.
customer_reviews.author: The Rocketdyke.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping the rain off the back of your neck. One thing to remember is that since the brim goes all the way around it makes getting into tight places a little more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Wright Family

customer_reviews.title: Its a Hard Hat, Nothing More To Say
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement hard hat. Mine was way too old. Like the full brim all the way around. Comfortable and light, i do not wear it all day as i do not work on site, only needed for site visits.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: It's A Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: Very light hat. What else can I say, they tell you to wear a hard hat and well I found this and it should work for have to wear it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Brakeman

customer_reviews.title: Safety Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson works for the county and ordered it for himself. He is very satisfied with it. He will purchase again next time he needs a hard hat.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Picture
customer_reviews.text: Not the product of the picture, more expensive than other seller and definitly not what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Cofortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hard hat. Its light in weight and comfortable to wear. I have been happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit and quality is just as good as all my other msa hardhats. The size is a medium, so with the ratcheting system it fits a large amount of hat sizes and is good for your averaged sized head. Plus it adjusts large enough for me to wear a beanie under it in the winter time.
customer_reviews.author: sax121289

customer_reviews.title: you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great hard hat, light weight, comfortable, durable, useful, and at a great price compared to same hard hat going at around $45 in stores near me. I would highly recommend this to anyone in need of a hard hat.
customer_reviews.author: moses

customer_reviews.title: MSA Safety Works Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: [...] [...] The MSA Safety Works 10006318 Full Brim Hard Hat that I ordered through Amazon.com, arrived on time and met all the expectations that I had for it. Thank You.

customer_reviews.title: What the heck!
customer_reviews.text: What the heck wasn’t even the hard hat in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Steven Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Use it almost every day and it does is job well! Very comfortable to wear even all day long! If you need a hard hat I would definitely recommend this brand! Very good quality!

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: Was kind of skeptical about buying a hard hat that I couldn't feel and see that was right in front of me but I really like the feel as I wear it on my head and makes me look professional on the job site.

customer_reviews.title: Great MSA Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: MSA quality hardhat delivered right to my door. Also love the ratchet head band.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, finish, and quality. Also better price than I could find locally.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: Great product, replacement for my old one. Good price. Fast shipping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard hat works great, MSA makes a great product, as comfortable as you can get.

customer_reviews.title: MSA Safety Work - Full Brim Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Functional. Finally an option to the traditional construction hard hat. Ratchet knob for head size makes adjustment easy. Cons: A bit heavy if worn throughout the day.

customer_reviews.title: but the item itself is well made and a good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty putting this together...but the item itself is well made and a good deal for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really like the harness, sits better than other hard hats I've had.

customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this it was exactly what he wanted. Adjusted easily and passed the wiggle test and fits with osh requirments.

customer_reviews.title: great safety hat..
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality, safe, durbale and sturdy. bright white, comfortable and great for my vast sticker collection. I'd deffi reorder when i need a new one..

customer_reviews.text: Nice hat very strong but, very hard to put together

customer_reviews.title: First time I wore the hard hat it saved my head.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I fell on a ship the 1st time I wore this hard hat. It saved me from serious injury. So glad I ordered this product.

customer_reviews.title: make sure your hard hat is not too old
customer_reviews.text: This hat was as expected and had a nice fresh manufacture date, less than 3 months old at the time. All the parts as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Like this hat.
customer_reviews.text: This hat was easy to set up. It stayed on my head without any problems. It saved my head from several bumps the first day I wore it to work.

customer_reviews.title: Plant workers hats!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these for work. They are the correct code for plant workers.

customer_reviews.title: Love it much nicer than my last I can wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it much nicer than my last I can wear my hood or hat under during the winter. And actually sits down in my head head

customer_reviews.title: It protects my head.
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected. Fits fine, keeps my noggin safe. Stickers stick on it. What more is there to say?

customer_reviews.title: these kept our heads safe and comfortable the whole time
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I went caving, these kept our heads safe and comfortable the whole time.

customer_reviews.text: It's already third time I order this product and from the same seller. NO COMMENTS. Really high quality and was really surprised with new type of the ratchet suspension.

customer_reviews.text: I was extremely surprised at the quality of the helmet. I am more than happy with it and have no regrets purchasing this whatsoever.

customer_reviews.text: As Described well made fit well Harness easy to install

customer_reviews.title: MSA full Brim Hard Hat
customer_reviews.text: perfect and very comfort,easy to adjust,good price and good quality, i like it and i love it,will buy another for friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sam LEE

customer_reviews.title: Aye, I was able to work in my back and side yards safely!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to work in my back and side yards for the first time in over 3 years without fear of being hit by a golf ball! So far about 200 balls have hit our house and yards. One hit me while working in the yard! What more could a person ask for? It took my aging brain a few moments to grasp the instructions on installing the headband. Not sure why they don't send it installed, but they do offer a flimsy excuse to that. It's a good product for what I need. You ask why we live on a golf course: It was vacant, we were homeless, and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kitsko

customer_reviews.title: If you are the boss, you need to look like one.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. My first full brim hard hat. I love it!

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and my head is on the larger side. Is comfortable enough to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: kirk kinsella

customer_reviews.title: Best hard hat to wear
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the construction business since I was a boy. I have worn many hard hats including a fiber made. This has been the most comfortable one I have used. The ratchet action is the best I have used. And the price cannot be beat. Good job.

customer_reviews.title: best hard hat
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and alot cheaper then at the stores very good buy and more protection for your head i love it
customer_reviews.author: Yandy rivera

customer_reviews.title: MSA Safety Works
customer_reviews.text: Used this helmet on the railroad for the military. As most know, the military re use as much gear as possible and these helmets are trashed. I bought one to have for myself, very comfy especially for extend hours. I bought the Weldas 20-3200 SWEATSopad Hard Hat Headbands, Twin Pack. I went through a pad by lunch due to the heat but I didn't get headaches like using other helmets. I was worried about the weight, turned out I didn't even feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mulcahey

customer_reviews.title: Great Hardhat
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable at a great price. I would recommend this over some of the more expensive hard hats I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: What's to say about a hard hat? I bought this as an emergency spare to keep in my trunk, but wore it a couple of days to break it in. It's comfortable, it doesn't slide around on my head, and it keeps things from falling onto or bumping into my noggin. All in all, a pretty decent "brain bucket". I'd recommend it to anyone who likes the full brim style.
customer_reviews.author: Big Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a standard cheap type with plastic clip. The upgrade may have been a 2$ upgrade, having the adjusting knob on the back is worth much more then that. Wish it sat a little lower on my head.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The hat fits well and was priced right and it got here quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: The brim hat is much better than the standard hard hat. Also, great price. Very easy to adjust to different size.

product_meta.title: Safety Works 10006318 Full Brim Hard Hat, White
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1| Color:WhiteV-Gard , white, ratchet Suspension non-slotted protective hard Hat, made of a durable polyethylene shell & a fas-trac Suspension system that adjusts snugly for a comfortable fit by simply rotating an adjustment dial in the back of the Hat, meets or exceeds the application requirements for a type I helmet, as outlined in ANSI Z89.1 1997, class E & G, the Suspension system is adjustable to fit Hat sizes from 6-1/2 to 8.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This White Full Brim Hard Hat has a short front brim that allows for unimpeded upward vision. The brim around the entire helmet helps keep rain and sun off of the neck and ears.
feature_bullets: This product is easy to use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars293 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
